     142                 :            :   /*!
     143                 :            :    * Convert polygon to inequality constraints which most tightly contain the points; i.e.,
     144                 :            :    * create constraints to bound the convex hull of polygon. The inequality constraints are
     145                 :            :    * represented as A and b, a set of constraints such that A*x <= b defining the region of
     146                 :            :    * space enclosing the convex hull.
     147                 :            :    * Based on the VERT2CON MATLAB method by Michael Kleder:
     148                 :            :    * http://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/fileexchange/7895-vert2con-vertices-to-constraints
     149                 :            :    * @param A the A matrix in of the inequality constraint.
     150                 :            :    * @param b the b matrix in of the inequality constraint.
     151                 :            :    * @return true if conversion successful, false otherwise.
     152                 :            :    */
     153                 :            :   bool convertToInequalityConstraints(
     154                 :            :     Eigen::MatrixXd & A,
